fields.name: Coagulate (Passive):
fields.value:
Immune to bleeding.
- Passive kept on class change.

fields.name: Stoneskin Potion (Day, 2 Uses):
fields.value: Drink a potion that ~~makes you death immune~~ gives you Basic Defense tonight. Usable day 1.

fields.name: Crimson Potion (Night):
fields.value:
Use a Heal potion on target player, ~~preventing their death~~ granting Powerful Defense and curing any bleeding.
- Does not affect unhealable attacks

fields.name: Emerald Potion (Night, 2 Uses):
fields.value:
Attack target player with concentrated toxicity.
- Cannot target the King

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to the end of the game.
